TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class TouchDevice : System.Windows.Input.InputDevice, System.Windows.Input.IManipulator
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TouchDevice extends System.Windows.Input.InputDevice implements class System.Windows.Input.IManipulator
Public MustInherit Class TouchDevice Inherits InputDevice Implements IManipulator
public ref class TouchDevice abstract : System::Windows::Input::InputDevice, System::Windows::Input::IManipulator
type TouchDevice = class inherit InputDevice interface IManipulator

summary.span: 表示觸控螢幕上手指所產生的單一觸控輸入。

span.span: Represents a single touch input produced by a finger on a touchscreen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會存取使用屬性。You typically access a by using the property. A代表單一的觸控式螢幕上。A represents a single touch on a screen. 如果多個觸控存在，請使用屬性來區別它們。If multiple touches are present, use the property to distinguish between them. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的繼承要求。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時擲回。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)並[繼承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列範例可讓您建立簡單的模式在拖曳兩隻手指觸控螢幕上。The following example enables you to create simple patterns on a by dragging two fingers on a touchscreen. 表示每個觸控在。Each touch is represented by a in the . 此模式會建立所提供的風格的觸控點之間繪製一條線。The pattern is created by drawing a line between the touch points that are provided by the touches. 這個範例需要 Windows 相容的觸控式螢幕。This example requires a Windows Touch-compatible screen. 下列標記會建立使用者介面，其中包含，置中於方格中，並附加觸控事件的事件處理常式。The following markup creates the user interface, which consists of a that is centered in a grid, and attaches the event handlers for the touch events. [!code-xaml[TouchEventsSample#000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/toucheventssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#000)] 下列程式碼會處理觸控事件。The following code handles the touch events. 當按下觸控，則擷取至。When a touch is pressed on the , the is captured to the . 當觸控已消除時，發行。When the touch is lifted, the is released. 當觸控移，則已核取。When a touch moves on the , the is checked. 如果移動來自第一個觸控時，會記錄它的位置。If the move came from the first touch, its location is recorded. 如果移動來自第二個觸控時，會一條線繪製的第一個觸控位置的第二個觸控位置。If the move came from the second touch, a line is drawn from the position of the first touch to the position of the second touch. [!code-csharp[TouchEventsSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/toucheventssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[TouchEventsSample#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/toucheventssample/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自應該呼叫這個方法，以停用目前的裝置。Classes that inherit from should call this method to deactivate the current device. A就會引發事件，而不需要對應事件。A event is raised without the corresponding event.
